typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		adjClose as double,
		adjHigh as double,
		adjLow as double,
		adjOpen as double,
		adjVolume as integer,
		close as double,
		date as string,
		divCash as double,
		high as double,
		low as double,
		open as double,
		splitFactor as double,
		volume as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FilePath',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[(concat('RAW/Tiingo/20210410/','*'))]) ~> RawTiingo
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100) ~> GetActiveStockList
RawTiingo alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertbyRow
UpsertbyRow derive(Ticker = left(substring(FilePath,22), (length(substring(FilePath,22)) - 5 ) )) ~> NewColTicker
GetActiveStockList filter(equals(toString(byName('Active')),'1')) ~> FilterForActiveStocks
FilterForActiveStocks alterRow(updateIf(lesser(toString(byName('LastUpdateDateKey')),''))) ~> AlterRow1
NewColTicker sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	container: 'datalake',
	folderPath: 'BASE/EoDStockPrice',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['date'],
	partitionFileNames:['TiingoEoDPrices.csv'],
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Ticker
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> BASETiingo
